TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyTabAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Identifies the property tab or tabs to display for the specified class or classes.

span.span: Identifies the property tab or tabs to display for the specified class or classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您加入新的屬性頁面，以便控制項。The lets you add a new property page to a control. 可以新增額外的屬性索引標籤，以公開元件的預設屬性集以外的屬性資訊。The can add additional property tabs to expose property information other than a component's default set of properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用指定的屬性索引標籤。程式碼範例會定義公開的另一個型別所選取的元件屬性的元件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to specify a property tab. The code example defines a component that exposes the properties of another selected component by type. [!code-cpp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是預設建構函式建立未初始化。This is a default constructor that creates an uninitialized . 這個建構函式可以用來衍生自此屬性，並呼叫來指定多個索引標籤型別。This constructor can be used to derive from this attribute and specify multiple tab types by calling .
